title: new client not working after update
body: Can someone, whose new client is working, post C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\system\user file because the last time it was downloaded this file had some stuff which is missing now after I reinstalled because of bugsplat. PLZ REPLY. I anyone has any other ideas how it might work pls write em down

replies.body: Bugsplatting on the new update suggests a bad installation that may have become corrupt.  In this case, it would be necessary to perform a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) to resolve whatever is causing the bugsplat to occur.  Let me know if you have any questions!
